participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, passionate about music and love for animals.
participant_1.background: I play the guitar to accompany my singing. I started my own business and now work from home, which allows me to take my morning walks to the beach more often. I hiked and swam at the lake on my last vacation. I love to eat sushi and pizza. I love my dog so much.

participant_2.name: Carlos
participant_2.personality: Family-oriented, artistic, and enjoys trying new things.
participant_2.background: I am Hispanic and my friends are my family. I collect little figurines. I like to experiment with different hairstyles and makeup looks on my days off. My family is very close and we always have each other's backs. I work in the emergency room.

content.text: Hola! I am a music lover. How about you?
I love music too! I am a guitarist.
That is awesome! I love playing the guitar to accompany my singing.
Nice! Where do you like to go on vacation?
I love to go hiking and swimming at the lake.
I love going to the beach.
I love going to the beach too. I love taking my dog with me.
I love dogs! They are so cute.
They are! I have a pitbull named Toby.
Pit bulls are awesome! Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to cook. I love making sushi and pizza.
I love to cook too! I love trying new recipes.
I love trying new recipes too! I also love to experiment with different hairstyles and makeup looks.
That is cool! I like to do that too.
I love my job. I started my own business and now I work from home.
That is awesome! I work in the emergency room.
That must be a lot of pressure.
It can be, but it is also very rewarding
